wording.title: How can we plan the city of tomorrow ?
wording.question: How can we plan the city of tomorrow ?

metas.title: How can we plan the city of tomorrow ?
metas.description: Any thought on that topic ? Join the consultation started by MIPIM along with Make.org

consultation.presentation: How to rethink the urban landscape ? Most importantly, how can we fully involve you in the process of imagining tomorrow's city ? This is the challenge we have set for ourselves by inviting you to MIPIM 2019. Prior to the event we will organize an open consultation, in partnership with MIPIM, giving you the opportunity to submit your ideas alongside thousands of other citizens. We will be turning the most popular ideas into reality supported by a realistic roadmap.

introCard.title: Thousands of citizens are submitting solution.
description: Take a stand on these solutions and affer yours
The ones with the most support will determine future actions.

signUpCard.title: Stay tuned on the actions implemented
